events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking information hasn’t been updated for days, and I’m really worried about when my package will be delivered.
The system has identified this issue as a delivery delay based on keywords in the customer message mentioning 'tracking' and 'not arrived'.
Assigning this delivery delay case to the shipping support team for further investigation and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your delayed shipment. I’m here to help you check on the status and find out what’s causing the delay.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address, so I can look into your delivery details and track the package more accurately?
Sure, my order number is 789654123 and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield. Please let me know what’s causing the hold-up.

Thank you for the details. We checked with the courier, and there was a temporary delay due to weather conditions. Your package is now en route and should arrive within 3 days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Thanks for the update! I appreciate you checking and letting me know. Looking forward to receiving the package soon.
We have resolved your delivery delay issue by coordinating with the shipping partner. Your package is now expected to arrive shortly.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your package and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your delivery issue appears to be resolved, we are closing this support case. Please reach out if you have further concerns.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your delivery delay inquiry.
